# Survival Basics
The Wasteland can be very harsh in our version of this Survival RPG where a wrong turn or action could lead to your death very quickly. Here's some basics to help keep you right.
In order to survive long term you'll need [color=green]Food[/color] & [color=green]Water[/color]. The day night cycle last 1 hour in total and in that time you're expected to eat and drink at least once or suffer death.
